Description:
Execution of CMC strategies for Pfizer Global Supply (PGS) initiated prioritized post approval changesResponsible for development and execution of regulatory strategies including response to HA queries.
Manages day-to-day regulatory activities associated with assigned PCFs within agreed upon timelines.
Collaborates with Cross Functional Teams (RRHS/PCO/RCM/Site CNM) and GRS-CMC to ensure the deliverables.
Works in a structured environment with supervision from Team Lead.
Liaise with Pfizer Global Supply and other support functions as needed.
Use of regulatory systems and management of CMC documentation and information in support of the CMC GRS.Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.Job Details
